answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Jason – hope the following are helpful:
Miami, FL
http://www.miamigov.com/finance/Policies&Procedures&Definitions/debt%20management%20procedures-%20revised%204-20-05.pdf
City and County of San Francisco Debt Management Policies and Procedures 
February 2010  
http://www.sfwater.org/modules/showdocument.aspx?documentid=421
San Diego, CA
https://www.sandiego.gov/fm/pdf/debtpolicy2012.pdf 
Lubbock TX
http://finance.ci.lubbock.tx.us/pdf/DebtPolicy.pdf
Attached is Richmond, CA’s Debt Policy
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Office
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org

author: Jason Zimmerman
text:
The City of Rockville is starting the process of formulating a Debt Policy and Procedures. I am seeking examples of your Debt Policy and Procedures if you can send them to me, please.
Thank you,
Jason Zimmerman
Revenue Supervisor
Finance Department
111 Maryland Ave
Rockville, MD 20850
Ph#240-314-8421
Fax#240-314-8419
jzimmerman@rockvillemd.gov
Consistent, Timely, Accurate, and Complete.
title: Debt Policy and Procedures
